com.lpoo.game.model.utils

Class B2DFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.model.utils.B2DFactory

  • class B2DFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for Box2D World objects. It only contains static methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

        world - The world were the platform will be.
        object - The object used to initialize the platform.
        Returns:
        The Platform Model of the created platform.
